name: Stone and Contracts
description:
When the Action Phase of the next Round begins: Create 3 Omni Element.
(You must have at least 2 Liyue characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase of the next Round begins:</color> Create 3 $[K411].\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3402}Liyue characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase of the next Round begins:</color> Create 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3402}Liyue characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: "This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."
